Hardcover Publisher: Limited Editions Club (1974), Avon, CT, 1974 Used. Two quarto volumes (7" x 10-3/4") bound in black and tan buckram, gilt-decorated and stamped. Translated by Richard Crawley, revised by R. C. Feetham, with an introduction by Peter Pouncey. Illustrated by A. Tassos with color and black-and-white plates. Of a total of 1500 copies SIGNED by the artist on the colophon page, this copy is not numbered but is SIGNED.
